title: Jennifer Lawrence caught giving grown man Aziz Ansari a piggyback ride
text:

Image 39 of 39 Jennifer Lawrence caught giving grown man Aziz Ansari a piggyback ride 1 / 39 Back to Gallery Aziz Ansari is a 32-year-old man who presumably knows how to walk already, but that didn't stop 25-year-old Jennifer Lawrence from picking him up like a toddler.
Lawrence and Ansari were reportedly out celebrating Amy Schumer's SNL hosting gig this weekend when she gave him the ride. We have to admit, it looks like a pretty fun night.
It is quite possible that Ansari, Schumer and Lawrence might have had the best night ever. In fact, we're pretty sure that when the 5'9" Lawrence isn't carrying her 5'6" friend Ansari around, she's still bringing the party with her. Take a look through the gallery above.
